line_1: Nor ever had she felt so desolate
line_2: The surly guards that round the draw-bridge wait,
Found thee, in thy abject state.

line_1: And now had plunged her low in sorrow desolate.
line_2: Herself on the sad changes of her fate,

line_1: And now had plunged her low in sorrow desolate.
line_2: And now had raised her to such high estate,

line_1: Sits deep in dust, abandon'd, desolate;
line_2: But now fall'n Sion, once the fair and great,
That once were happy, rich, and great?
